title: Third student injured in Townville
content:
Authorities confirmed Tuesday morning that a third student incurred minor injuries last Wednesday in the Townville Elementary School shooting.
The student's injuries were minor and did not require medical treatment, according to a statement from the Anderson County Sheriff's Office.
"He was there, in amongst the ones that got hit," Anderson County Sheriff John Skipper said Tuesday.
Previously, officials said two students and a teacher were injured in the shooting. The 10th Judicial Circuit announced Monday night that there was an additional student who had been injured.
